column8: text

I was at a roundtable last week and they had a few pemuda UMNO leaders and the oldfags together in one place.the youngins accuse the old guard of UMNO for wanting to co-opt PAS into the BN coalition, which they think is a bad idea. while the old ones basically told them there's no such thing, STFU, and stop being so paranoid.after everything went down, i caught up with one of the younger ones and asked him if he can corroborate his claims, he basically just said "the grassroots are supportive of this idea, so the higher-ups would rather appease their voter base instead of doing the right thing."betul ke? i dont have any grassroot UMNO friends, so i ask /k.
edited
Ya mang.Can songlap with ameno and go to heaven with psa.Why not?Kalau nak sembah duit kena buat baik baik ni.
K/ has Umno grassroots?
got one. wait them come in
byk ...
Water the grass and see the mushrooms pop out.
Nothing new. They've been doing this for the past 60 years
no need.we need pas as opp party.easy to brainwash public to vote bn.if pas in bn.we lose this opportunity.
PAS come from UMNO also.Even durig Mahathir time they're people within UMNO that wants co-operation with PAS.
OTAIs are correct... umno has no intention to rope-in pas into bn... they just want to create havoc within oppositions...the youngins still naive and green in politicking....
eventually malaysia politic will be pro-muslims vs secular muslims + non-muslim
pas oredi in weak  position after nik aziz die.3 corner fight in kelantan oredi make pas high risk lost kelantan.we don't need this kind of party.
everybody fighting each other but didn't realized they're all in a same sinking boat.
It is because they need audience. Politic is a show, a very entertaining one in malaysia.
pas don't know how to politics.non malay hate pas.we can used this for bn advantage.but if bring pas in bn.not so healthy la.
True. At the end..beeend win.
Trigereddddd
bump
Pas no choice to gang up with bn coz they can't win alone.. But Pas will only get none benefit from bn if they winI agree with pas young generation.. At least they know what's going on

True but I think that's because young generation don't know how to politics. BN very smart to 'offer' PAS something for the return of guaranteed win. No black and white and BN could easily let go of pas after winning with little repercussions.  It's old school ruthless politic best for old gen
There's a reason why they are umno grassroots and they aren't here in big numbers. It's coz the majority of themAre uneducated and just take in whatever shit umno feeds them
I think the old generation need to change their mindset.. Same like business, u can't use the same strategy every time.. U got to change in order to improve and compete with competitor
After lose say takdir. will of god.
paid troopers are grassroots?

True that's the best but that mean no more money under table. And to do that they have to admit they are doing wrong which is political suicide especially when they denied that all these year. Time will tell but I'll bet that BN win big.
if pas lose kelantan.pas will say takdir and try again next GE15.same taktik and lose x 10.
BN may win now but not in future.. People will wake up and learn
why the youngins don't want to cooperate with PAS? i thought perpaduan ummah?
